bibl.title: Herakles and the Eleusinian Mysteries: P. Mil. Vogl. I 20, 18-32 Revisited.
bibl.note: Preliminary results of a wider work on rhetorical papyri, aiming to produce a comprehensive Corpus. - [Introduction, including the text of P. Mil. Vogl. I, 20 (= Pack2 1996), 18-32, fully re-edited and translated]. - Overall Assessment of the Text. - Commentary. - Bibliography.
bibl.seg: COLOMO Daniela, Herakles and the Eleusinian Mysteries: P. Mil. Vogl. I 20, 18-32 Revisited.
